Description:

This is the story of five closely intertwined fate and unrequited 
love in war-torn mire.Soprovozhdaemye faithful dog, heroes trying 
to survive, overcoming adversity military trenches.
The fates of all characters in the game "Valiant Hearts" inextricably 
linked. Friendship, love, sacrifice and misery - all waiting for them 
to fight for their humanity during the war.

Features:

Animated adventure book. Immerse yourself in history, going along 
with the heroes gone from green forest to the dark expanse of the 
French trenches and snow-covered fields. This game creates a special 
mood thanks to a unique artistic style and give you an incredible adventure.
Research, action and puzzle. Help the heroes survive the First World War, 
fight, solve puzzles to penetrate into the ranks of the enemy a taste of 
this exciting adventure.
Read stories 5 characters ... Lost in the maze of trenches, play for five 
strangers to each other characters whose fates are intertwined. Relive 
the hardships of war and give the young German soldier find love!
Relive the First World War from 1914 to 1918. This fictional story takes 
you into such famous cities such as Reims or Montfaucon of 1914-1918. 
You will take part in the famous battles of the Western Front - Battle 
of the Marne, or Battle of the Somme!
Team true masters in Ubisoft Montpellier. Yes removed small: small in 
size team of professionals includes audio and art director of projects 
such as "Beyond Good & Evil" and "King Kong," Peter Jackson's leading 
designers and projects "Rayman Origins" and "Rayman Legends" .

Features repack
Valiant Hearts: The Great War
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
